name: Neon Wings: Air Race
descr:
[h2]ABOUT THIS GAME[/h2]Elevate your gaming experience: with the freedom of flying, you can navigate through vivid levels and feel like you are in an airborne Mario Kart in the 80s (but better). Buy and customize your ships, pimp your hangar, learn how to use 7 different skills to get revenge on your friends or best the computer: in Neon Wings, you can play with up to 6 people, either LAN or online.

Take your racing up to the sky and fly free![h2]THE GAME CONTAINS[/h2][list][li] 3 single player game modes: tournament, time trial, and single race
[/li][li] 4 race types: Knockout, Elimination, Rush and Standard Race
[/li][li] 5 increasingly difficult tournaments and their reversed versions
[/li][li] 7 different skills that enhance your experience
[/li][li] 7 original music inspired by the 80s to feel the heat
[/li][li] 10 customization options for your hangar (minigames, lights, visual extravaganza)
[/li][li] 11 custom paints for every ship
[/li][li] 11 unique maps
[/li][li] 12 upgradeable ships[/li][/list][h2]7 DIFFERENT SKILLS[/h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Booster.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Portal.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Money.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Repair.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Homing.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Mine.png?t=1704426932[/img][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1462760/extras/Shield.png?t=1704426932[/img]
[list][li] Nitro: The ship gets faster for a certain amount of time
[/li][li] Portal: Players can shoot a teleport missile to the next checkpoint that teleports them (and anyone nearby) to the following mark 
[/li][li] Money Bag: Shoots a golden missile that spawns credits on the track (not available in multiplayer) 
[/li][li] Homing Missile: Shoots a missile that automatically targets an enemy or a mine 
[/li][li] Mine: Places three mines on the track behind the Player. These can damage other Players or deflect Homing Missiles.
[/li][li] Shield: Prevents damage when colliding with walls, missiles, or mines.Repair: Repairs the ship to full health   [/li][/list][h2]4 RACE TYPES[/h2][list][li] Standard Race: All 7 skills are available. You win by crossing the finish line first.
[/li][li] Elimination: All players have increased health, but only one life. The last one standing wins the race, or if there are multiple survivors, the first to finish is the champion. You only have Shield and Homing Missile skills.
[/li][li] Knockout: Similar to the Standard Race, but in every lap, the Player/AI on the last place last gets eliminated.  
[/li][li] Rush: Every power-up transform into a nitro in this mode. Win by being the fastest![/li][/list]
